title: BONUS EPISODE: Fivio Foreign Talks About Growth, Drill, Ye, & Pop Smoke
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning! Fivio Foreign sits down with Ebro in the Morning for a candid conversation about his growth as an artist and person, the state of Drill Music, his meeting with the mayor, needing Beyoncé's blessing on a sample, working with Nicki Minaj, Pop Smoke. and more. His new album, B.I.B.L.E. is scheduled to be released April 8.

LISTEN TO "TAP IN WITH TT" ON:

Apple Podcasts -https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tap-in-with-tt/id1618314923

Hot97.com -Tap In With TT | Hot97

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/0a2g28v979wHIY0Vlnrjul?si=a91f5e2a4d254f6d

iHeart -Tap In With TT | iHeart
